tags.label: p-d
tags.description: Pass down information from previous (non p-*) element to downstream siblings when events fire.

attributes.label: on
attributes.description: The event name to monitor for, from previous non p-* element.

attributes.label: to
attributes.description: css pattern to match for from downstream siblings.

attributes.label: prop
attributes.description: Name of property to set on matching downstream siblings.

attributes.label: val
attributes.description: Specifies path to JS object from event, that should be passed to downstream siblings.  Value of '.' passes entire entire object.

attributes.label: skip-init
attributes.description: Don't fire initial 'fake event' in order to sync up downstream siblings.

attributes.label: noblock
attributes.description: Don't block event propagation.

attributes.label: m
attributes.description: Maximum number of matching elements expected to be found.

tags.label: p-u
tags.description: Pass information to an element specified by id within a specific Shadow DOM realm

attributes.label: to
attributes.description: id of element to pass event info to.

attributes.label: prop
attributes.description: Name of property to set on matching downstream siblings.

attributes.label: val
attributes.description: Specifies path to JS object from event, that should be passed to downstream siblings.  Value of '.' passes entire entire object.

attributes.label: skip-init
attributes.description: Don't fire initial 'fake event' in order to sync up downstream siblings.

attributes.label: noblock
attributes.description: Don't block event propagation.

tags.label: p-d-r
tags.description: Extension of p-d, that passes down into children recursively, based on p-d-if attribute.

attributes.label: on
attributes.description: The event name to monitor for, from previous non p-* element.

attributes.label: to
attributes.description: css pattern to match for from downstream siblings.

attributes.label: prop
attributes.description: Name of property to set on matching downstream siblings.

attributes.label: val
attributes.description: Specifies path to JS object from event, that should be passed to downstream siblings.  Value of '.' passes entire entire object.

attributes.label: skip-init
attributes.description: Don't fire initial 'fake event' in order to sync up downstream siblings.

attributes.label: noblock
attributes.description: Don't block event propagation.

attributes.label: m
attributes.description: Maximum number of matching elements expected to be found.

tags.label: p-d-x
tags.description: Extension of p-d with less used features including nested property setting.

attributes.description: The event name to monitor for, from previous non p-* element.

tags.label: p-d-s
tags.description: Extension of p-d-r that can pass 'sideways'.

tags.label: p-destal
tags.description: Extension of p-d-x than can latch onto containing host element or address bar, so a web component can also serve as a standalone page.
